## runtimeType() function

Just a Symbol that is used as any type T at runtime.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function runtimeType<T>(name?: string): T;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description       |
| --------- | ------ | ----------------- |
| name      | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

T
